SELECT ip.*, p.V_PRODUCT_NM, p.N_PRODUCT_PRICE, p.V_PRODUCT_BRAND, p.V_PRODUCT_ORIGIN, p.V_PRODUCT_MANUFACTOR, p.V_PRODUCT_STATUS, p.D_PRODUCT_MANUFACTOR_DATE, p.V_CATEGORY_CD FROM TB_INCOMING_PRODUCT ip JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON ip.V_PRODUCT_CD = p.V_PRODUCT_CD WHERE ip.PK_INCOMING_PRODUCT_SEQ = #{pkIncomingProductSeq}
